comment: Very patient.  Straight forward. Enthusiastic and very Positive.  If you need to improve your writing,  sign-up for her class!

You have to work, but the way Barden draws you into the class, makes you want to work!  Class discussions and real world examples help to grab the student's attention.  With all the different backgrounds and ages in class, Mrs. Barden really tried to draw everyone in and make them the best writer they could be.  Cannot loose with Mrs. B!

She is an excellent instructor and provided the class with all of the tools needed for success.  "Show Up To Class" or you will fail.  She encourages the class to succeed.  I enjoyed her teaching style.

Great class.  Goes over and over the basics with plenty of chance s to revise learning from my mistakes.  Curtails class to individual student needs.  If you need to learn to write and interpret literature, this is your professor!
